snippet.title: Exertus - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Loneminded is proud to present Exertus, an action platformer with free-run inspired movement mechanics.

Exertus has been crafted as a spiritual successor to Inertia. Using community and internal feedback to smoothen out and improve the overall game and movement set whilst setting it out into semi-linear levels. 

As the player, your aim is simply to get from point A to point B. You can choose to follow the beaten path or use the off-path environment within the semi-linear levels to optimise your time - the choice is yours to make.

Exertus is available for purchase on Windows and Linux via Steam on the 8th July 2019.
